title: Stat Batch for Options on MJ Contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MJ Contract is either Approved, Update Approved, Expired or Approved for next Year 
AND an option on the contract has not been marked official 
AND has system checked criteria that is met
custom_steps: WHEN the Contract Stat Batch is run
custom_expected: THEN the option or options will be marked as earned

title: Stat Batch for Performance or other bonuses on MJ Contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MJ Contract is either Approved, Update Approved, Expired or Approved for Next Year 
AND a Performance or Other type of Bonus on the contract has not been marked official 
AND has system checked criteria that is met
custom_steps: WHEN the Contract Stat Batch is run
custom_expected: THEN the bonus or bonuses will be marked as earned

title: Stat Batch for Salary Escalator on MJ Contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MJ Contract is either Approved, Update Approved, Expired or Approved for next Year 
AND a salary escalator on the contract has not been marked official 
AND has system checked criteria that is met
custom_steps: WHEN the Contract Stat Batch is run
custom_expected: THEN the salary escalator(s) will be marked as earned

title: Stat Batch for Assignment Bonus on MJ Contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MJ Contract is either Approved, Update Approved, Expired or Approved for next Year 
AND an Assignment Bonus on the contract has not been marked official 
AND the Assignment Bonus has "if earned, mark additional bonuses earned" checked
AND has system checked criteria that is met
custom_steps: WHEN the Contract Stat Batch is run
custom_expected:
THEN the Assignment bonus will be marked as earned 
AND all other bonuses specified under the "if earned, marked additional bonuses earned" will be marked as earned

title: Notification generated if items are marked earned
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Stat Batch has run
custom_steps: WHEN bonuses or escalators are marked earned by the batch
custom_expected: THEN a notification will be generated to the Club Basic and club admin of the signing org and to the LRD Basic and LRD admin

title: 5.6 Arbitration And Settlement
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is creating a contract and has permissions to update the status
AND user has created an arbitration or settlement contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user updates the status of the contract from Preliminary to Terms Submitted
custom_expected: THEN user receives an error message; "A <type of contract> cannot be submitted."

title: 5.7 Max Salary Cut Rule
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is creating a contract and has permissions to update the status
AND the major league player is being re-signed
custom_steps:
WHEN the first year compensation equals 0
OR the first year compensation is greater than or equal to the player's compensation last year multiplied by the Max Salary Cut from the previous year rate
OR the first year compensation is greater than or equal to the player's compensation from 2 years ago multiplied by the Max Salary Cut from 2 years ago rate
custom_expected: THEN the user receives an override message; "This contract violates the Max Salary Cut rule."

title: Click override on 5.7
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has completed test case [C66432]
custom_steps: WHEN override button is clicked
custom_expected: THEN contract moves to next state

title: 5.8 Gauranteed Salary Provision
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is creating a contract and has permissions to update the status
custom_steps:
WHEN the contract's guaranteed amount is equal to the total compensation amount
AND there is no Salary Guaranteed provision
custom_expected: THEN user receives an override message; "This contract includes a guaranteed compensation but there is no Guarantee Provision covenant."

title: Click override on 5.8
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has completed test case [C66433]
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the override button
custom_expected: THEN contract moves to the next state
